launch.launchSite: Cape Canaveral Air Force Station SLC-41

objectives: Search for evidence of past or present water on Mars
Identify landing sites for future Mars missions
Provide a high-data-rate communications relay for other Mars missions

payloads.name: High Resolution Imaging Science Experiment (HiRISE)
payloads.purpose: Provides very high-resolution images of the Martian surface.

payloads.name: CRISM (Compact Reconnaissance Imaging Spectrometer for Mars)
payloads.purpose: Identifies minerals on the surface to map water-related deposits.

outcome.summary: Has provided more high-resolution data of Mars than all previous missions combined and serves as a vital communication link.
